item.description:
There's nothing better to help you wake you up in the morning than a little exercise so let's meet at the Gantcher Center for a nice walk before work. If the weather is outstanding, we may walk outside such as at the Ellis Oval. Otherwise, we will do a few laps of talking & walking around the indoor track in the Gantcher Center. So what do you say we get together to meet some of our colleagues, compare notes about work, burn a few calories, and get a jump start on a productive day.

While I probably need to say that you should check with your doctor before exercising, you are encouraged to walk at whatever pace is comfortable for you.

If you work up a sweat, the Cousens Athletic Complex has changing and shower facilities on the basement level. If you intend to use the lockers, you are strongly encouraged to bring a lock and to avoid leaving valuables in the locker.

Please note: the entrance to Gantcher is through the Cousens Facility and requires a Tufts ID.



As always, if you have any questions, feel free to shoot me an email at rich.kelley@tufts.edu.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Tufts hat and a goofy name tag.
item.name: Wake-up Walk
